document.text:
Original Message 
From: l= 
Sent: Monday, November 29, 2021 12:33 PM 
To: =I (USANYS) <EM> 
Subject: (EXTERNAL) FBI Still Needing Tips Regarding Jeffrey Epstein /  Ghislaine Maxwell? 
Dear Ms. MI 
I feel Jeffrey Epstein &/or Ghislaine Maxwell reached out tome, in July 2019, (around the time he was apprehended) via 
Seeking Arrangements (probably just "Seeking" these days.) It was a brief communication out of Palm Beach, but it was 
right to the point. The person/people wanted me to be a recruiter and they basically wanted to know if it seemed 
appealing to go out partying and "bring home girls to Daddy." This notion seemed wholly cringeworthy with ick-factor 
and I don't think I replied in any fashion. 
It may be worth the while for the FBI to subpoena Seeking Arrangements' records out of Palm Beach. I feel extremely 
confident that Maxwell &/or Epstein were actively using this platform for recruiting. I think they were attracted to me, 
because my profile pics looked like her...we could pass for family. 
From what you know, is this tidbit important? Does the FBI know about the Seeking Arrangement connection? Should I 
be conveying this information to anyone in particular? I'm sort of afraid to become involved, but I also feel everything 
should be done so justice can help the young victims. 
Thank you, 
Sent from my iPad 
1 
3501.551-001 
Page 1 of 1 
SUBJECT TO PROTECTIVE ORDER PARAGRAPHS 7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17 
EFTA00031299
